mace.description: A metal club with a heavy head.

quarterstaff.name: Quarterstaff
quarterstaff.description: A wooden staff that can be wielded with one or two hands.

sickle.name: Sickle
sickle.description: A curved blade attached to a short handle.

spear.name: Spear
spear.description: A simple polearm with a pointed tip.

light_crossbow.name: Light Crossbow
light_crossbow.description: A small crossbow that fires bolts.

dart.name: Dart
dart.description: A small, weighted projectile designed for throwing.

shortbow.name: Shortbow
shortbow.description: A small bow that fires arrows.

sling.name: Sling
sling.description: A simple leather strap used to hurl small projectiles.

battleaxe.name: Battleaxe
battleaxe.description: A heavy axe designed for combat.

flail.name: Flail
flail.description: A metal weight attached to a handle by a chain.

glaive.name: Glaive
glaive.description: A polearm with a large, curved blade on the end.

greataxe.name: Greataxe
greataxe.description: A large, heavy axe designed for two-handed use.

greatsword.name: Greatsword
greatsword.description: A large sword designed for two-handed use.

longsword.name: Longsword
longsword.description: A versatile sword designed for one or two-handed use.

rapier.name: Rapier
rapier.description: A slender, pointed sword designed for thrusting.

scimitar.name: Scimitar
scimitar.description: A curved sword with a sharp edge on the convex side.

shortsword.name: Shortsword
shortsword.description: A small sword designed for one-handed use.

longbow.name: Longbow
longbow.description: A large bow that fires arrows with great force.

heavy_crossbow.name: Heavy Crossbow
heavy_crossbow.description: A large crossbow that fires bolts with great force.

padded.name: Padded Armor
padded.description: Armor made of quilted layers of cloth and batting.

studded_leather.name: Studded Leather Armor
studded_leather.description: Armor made of tough leather reinforced with close-set rivets.

hide.name: Hide Armor
hide.description: Armor made of thick furs and pelts.

chain_shirt.name: Chain Shirt
chain_shirt.description: Armor made of interlocking metal rings worn over a layer of padding.

scale_mail.name: Scale Mail
scale_mail.description: Armor consisting of a coat and leggings of leather covered with overlapping pieces of metal.

breastplate.name: Breastplate
breastplate.description: Armor consisting of a fitted metal chest piece worn with supple leather.

half_plate.name: Half Plate
half_plate.description: Armor consisting of shaped metal plates that cover most of the body.

ring_mail.name: Ring Mail
ring_mail.description: Armor made of leather with heavy rings sewn into it.

chain_mail.name: Chain Mail
chain_mail.description: Armor made of interlocking metal rings worn over a layer of quilted fabric.

splint.name: Splint Armor
splint.description: Armor made of narrow vertical strips of metal riveted to a backing of leather.

plate.name: Plate Armor
plate.description: Armor consisting of shaped, interlocking metal plates to cover the entire body.

shield.name: Shield
shield.description: A wooden or metal shield carried in one hand.

burglar.name: Burglar's Pack
burglar.description: Includes a backpack, a bag of 1,000 ball bearings, 10 feet of string, a bell, 5 candles, a crowbar, a hammer, 10 pitons, a hooded lantern, 2 flasks of oil, 5 days rations, a tinderbox, a waterskin, and 50 feet of hempen rope.

diplomat.name: Diplomat's Pack
diplomat.description: Includes a chest, 2 cases for maps and scrolls, a set of fine clothes, a bottle of ink, an ink pen, a lamp, 2 flasks of oil, 5 sheets of paper, a vial of perfume, sealing wax, and soap.

dungeoneer.name: Dungeoneer's Pack
dungeoneer.description: Includes a backpack, a crowbar, a hammer, 10 pitons, 10 torches, a tinderbox, 10 days of rations, a waterskin, and 50 feet of hempen rope.

explorer.name: Explorer's Pack
explorer.description: Includes a backpack, a bedroll, a mess kit, a tinderbox, 10 torches, 10 days of rations, a waterskin, and 50 feet of hempen rope.

thieves_tools.name: Thieves' Tools
thieves_tools.description: This set of tools includes a small file, a set of lock picks, a small mirror mounted on a metal handle, a set of narrow-bladed scissors, and a pair of pliers.

herbalism_kit.name: Herbalism Kit
herbalism_kit.description: This kit contains a variety of instruments such as clippers, mortar and pestle, and pouches and vials used by herbalists.

healers_kit.name: Healer's Kit
healers_kit.description: This kit is a leather pouch containing bandages, salves, and splints. The kit has ten uses.

healing_potion.name: Potion of Healing
healing_potion.description: A character who drinks this magical red fluid regains 2d4 + 2 hit points.

antitoxin.name: Antitoxin
antitoxin.description: A creature that drinks this vial of liquid gains advantage on saving throws against poison for 1 hour.

backpack.name: Backpack
backpack.description: A backpack can hold up to 1 cubic foot or 30 pounds of gear.

bedroll.name: Bedroll
bedroll.description: A portable, padded mat for sleeping.

rope_hempen.name: Hempen Rope (50 feet)
rope_hempen.description: Rope has 2 hit points and can be burst with a DC 17 Strength check.

rope_silk.name: Silk Rope (50 feet)
rope_silk.description: Stronger than hempen rope, silk rope has 2 hit points and can be burst with a DC 17 Strength check.

torch.name: Torch
torch.description: A torch burns for 1 hour, providing bright light in a 20-foot radius and dim light for an additional 20 feet.

waterskin.name: Waterskin
waterskin.description: A waterskin can hold up to 4 pints of liquid.

rations.name: Rations (1 day)
rations.description: Rations consist of dry foods suitable for extended travel, including jerky, dried fruit, hardtack, and nuts.
